mapper.update: update company_info set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, licence_num = #{licenceNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, computer_num = #{computerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tax_password = #{taxPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_path = #{clientPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, company_name, licence_num, computer_num, tax_password, client_path, remarks from company_info
